item.title: SQL Saturday Presentations
item.description: The two first weekends in August I were in Cape Town and Johannesburg respectively presenting at SQL Saturday events. I had a great time, and the audience were terrific. My employer Derivco graciously gave me some “swag” to hand out, and that went down a treat. Thanks Derivco!!
